name: Snipers
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese. Invisible, silent, deadly. Let confrontations lead you to victory, get promoted and make your avatar’s skills evolve. Purchase new weapons you can improve and new equipment to trap your enemies or hide (hologram projectors, thermal glasses, drones, etc.). Discover the first online multiplayer FPS exclusively developed for snipers!
